AI Description: OpenACC is a directive-based programming model designed to simplify parallel programming of heterogeneous CPU/GPU systems. It allows developers to accelerate applications through directives without the need for low-level programming of accelerators.
Core Features: Directive-Based Programming Model, Heterogeneous Cpu/Gpu Systems Support, Accelerates Applications Without Low-Level Programming Of Accelerators, Portable Across Different Platforms & Compilers
General Tags: Parallel Programming, Heterogeneous Systems, Accelerated Computing
